title: Simple
description: Ethan, or Simple as he is called, is a huge bear of a man, with the heart and mind of an innocent child.Leanne, his young half- sister, is the only person who tries to take care of him.Set in the beautiful backwoods of West Virginia, will they be able to escape from their vicious and uncaring family?This story has it all. Love and caring, taking on fear and brutality. The terror of nearly being burned alive, of being hounded like animals.And the overpowering triumph of love, defeating the evil of hatred.
author: Anita Dawes
